label: 擬文章生
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Students who answered three questions out of five given them by the Doctors of Literature (Monjō-hakase) of the Bureau of Education (Daigakuryō) on the Shi-chi, the Ch'ien-Han-shu and Hou-Han-shu were called Students of Literature (Gimonjō-sei) (Part A, p. 299).  [文章博士、大学寮、史記、前漢書、後漢書]
